title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 343.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 343.3 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Part shall
apply to any not-for-profit corporation, local government, school district, or
department or part thereof which meets the requirements for providing an
alcohol awareness program for youth under this Part, and which wishes to become
a certified provider of such programs. (b) A provider shall not operate a program
called an alcoholism awareness program for youth nor shall it promote such a
program to the courts as a program established pursuant to chapter 683 of the

Laws of 1990 unless such provider has been approved and certified by the
division. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
343.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
